SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractDAO<T>
Abstract DAO object class.
AbstractDatabaseServlet
Abstract base class for servlets that require database access.
AbstractFilter
Abstract base class for HTTP filters providing common functionality.
AbstractResource
Abstract base class for resources providing JSON serialization functionality.
AbstractRR
Abstract base class for REST resources.
Action
Class to manage the row of table action in database
Actions
Contains constants for the actions performed by the application.
ActionTarget
Represents the potential targets for a player action in the game..
The targets can be specified either based on a role, in which case a list of players with that role is also needed, or for a single player.
AddFriendDAO
DAO (Data Access Object) for adding a friend relationship to the database.
AddFriendRR
Rest Resource for adding a friend relationship.
CarpenterAbilityDAO
DAO (Data Access Object) class for retrieving the carpenter's ability status from the database.
CreateGameDAO
Create a new game into the database
CurrentGameServlet
Servlet that manages the "current game" section.
DataAccessObject<T>
Interface for accessing the database and retrieving output parameters.
DayActionsResults
Represents the results of day actions in the game.
DeleteFriendDAO
DAO (Data Access Object) for deleting a friend relationship from the database.
DeleteFriendRR
Rest Resource for deleting a friend relationship.
DeletePlayerDAO
Deletion of a player record from the database based on the player's username by updating the mail to an invalid one (i.e.
ErrorCode
Enumeration representing error codes and their associated error messages and HTTP status codes.
Friend
Represents a friend of a user.
Game
Represents a game entity.
GameAction
Represents a game action performed by a player.
This class is used to store information about an action of a player with a role towards a target.
GameActionsGetRR
Handles the HTTP GET request to retrieve game actions based on the current game phase.
GameActionsPostRR
Handles the HTTP POST request to handle game actions.
GameDispatcherServlet
Servlet that manages the REST calls for the game section.
GameLogGetRR
class to manege the log of a game
GameMasterFilter
Filter to manage access to Master protected resources.
This filter allows access to certain resources only to the game master, such as returning all information when the game is not yet finished.
GamePhase
Enumeration representing phases in a game.
GamePlayersRR
Handles the GET request for /game/players.
GameRoleAction
Enumeration representing roles in the Lupus in Fabula game.
GameSettingsGetRR
Handles the GET request for /game/settings.
GameSettingsPostRR
Handles the POST request for /game/settings.
GameStatusRR
Handles the GET request for /game/status.
GetActionByIdGameDAO
Class to get all the action associate to a game join with the name of the action and order by round, phase and subphase
GetDeadPlayersByGameIdDAO
Retrieves the dead players in a game by its game ID.
GetDeadPlayersInformationByGameIdDAO
Retrieves the dead players in a game by its game ID.
GetGameByGameIdDAO
Retrieves the status of a game by its game ID.
GetGameIdByPlayerUsernameDAO
Retrieves the maximum game ID (the last game) for a player.
GetGameIdFormPublicGameIdDAO
Search a game using the public gameID, return the private gameID
GetGamePlayersDAO
Search the list of players playing in a game using the private gameID, returns such list
GetMasterFromIdGameDAO
Retrieves the username of the master of a game.
GetPlayerLogsDAO
DAO class to retrieve logs of a specific player.
GetPlayersAndRoleByGameIdDAO
Gat all player in a game with their role
GetPlayersByGameDAO
DAO class to retrieve a list of players by game ID.
GetRoleByGameIdAndPlayerUsernameDAO
Retrieves the role associated with a particular player username in a specific game.
GetStatsPerRoleDAO
DAO class to retrieve statistics per role for a specific player.
HomePageServlet
Represents a servlet for handling requests related to the home page.
InsertIntoActionDAO
Inserts a new Action record into the database, storing information such as the game ID, player, round, phase, subphase, type of action, and target.
InsertIntoPlayAsInDAO
Adds a new record indicating the role a player has in a game.
IsDorkyAWolfDAO
Returns if the role of Dorky has become a Wolf pointing at an evil role.
IsExplorerAWolfDAO
Return whether the Explorer role has already been used the action explore in the game
IsJesterVotedOutDAO
Determines whether the Jester role was voted out but not killed by Sam.
IsPuppyAWolfDAO
Returns if the role of Puppy has become a Wolf
LastPlayerProtectedByKnightDAO
Return the last player protected by the Knight in the game
ListFriendsDAO
DAO (Data Access Object) for retrieving a list of friends for a given user from the database.
ListFriendsRR
Rest Resource for listing friends of a player.
LogContext
Provides the log context for the application on a per-thread basis.
LoginPlayerDAO
Search if a user exists by username/email and password
LoginSignupServlet
Abstract DAO object class.
Message
Represents a message to be sent as a response.
This message can be an error message or a generic message.
NewGameServlet
Represents a servlet for handling requests related to creating a new game.
NightActionsResults
Represents the results of night actions in the game.
Player
Represents a player in the system.
PlayerInGameDAO
Searches whether a player is in a game; if so, returns the game public ID
PlayerWithPlagueInGameDAO
DAO for retrieving players with the plague in a specific game and round.
PlaysAsIn
Represents an entity containing information about a player inside a game.
PlaysJoinGame
Represents a joined entity containing information about a game and a player's participation.
PossibleGameActions
Utility class for managing possible game actions and generating action targets based on the game state.
Resource
Represents a resource that can be serialized to JSON.
ResourceList<T>
Represents a list of resources that can be serialized to JSON.
RestResource
Represents a REST resource that can serve a REST request.
Role
Represents a role in the system.
RoleCardinality
Represents a role and its associated cardinality.
Is used to store information about a role and its cardinality, used in GameSettingsPostRR.
RoleType
Enumeration representing the types of roles in the Lupus in Fabula game.
RulesServlet
Represents a servlet for handling requests related to displaying game rules.
SearchPlayerByEmailDAO
Search a user by email
SearchPlayerByPartialUsernameDAO
Search a user by partial username
SearchPlayerByUsernameDAO
Search a user by username
SearchPlayerRR
RR for searching a player.
SelectPlayersAndRolesByGameIdDAO
Retrieves the usernames of players along with their roles for a given game ID.
SelectRoleByTypeDAO
Retrieves roles based on their type.
SelectRoleDAO
Retrives all roles
SignupPlayerDAO
Insert the user into the database
StatsRole
Represents statistics about a role.
UpdateDeathOfPlayerInTheGameDAO
Adds a new record indicating the role a player has in a game.
UpdateEmailByUsernameDAO
updates the email address of a player in the database from their old email address to a new email address, based on the specified username and old email.
UpdateGameDAO
Updates game-related information in the database, such as the game duration, who wins the game, the number of rounds, and the current phase of the game.
UpdatePasswordByUsernameDAO
Updates a player's password in the database from their old password to a new password, based on the specified username and old password.
UserDispatcherServlet
Represents a servlet responsible for dispatching requests related to user resources in the Lupus web application.
UserFilter
Filter to manage access to the protected resources.
UserLogsGetRR
Handles the GET request for retrieving logs for a specific user.
UserMeDeleteRR
Represents a REST resource handler for handling DELETE requests related to the current user's account.
UserMePutRR
Represents a REST resource handler for handling PUT requests related to updating the current user's account.
UserPageServlet
Manages requests related to user pages.
UserStatisticGetRR
Handles the GET request for retrieving statistics for a specific user.
UserUpdate
Represents the update of a user in the database, so when a user wants to change his password or his email.
UserUsernameGetRR
Represents a REST resource handler for handling GET requests related to retrieving user information by username.
VictoryMessage
Represents a message indicating the result of a victory condition in the game.
WinFaction
Enumeration representing the winning factions in the game.
